Package controller

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ApiEpisodeLoader
    ApiEpisodeLoader is responsible for calling the API and returning the full API response for a single episode based on that episode's API id
    Auth
    Manages Amazon Web Service authorization tokens and credentials management for log in endpoint calls
    EpisodeSelect
    EpisodeSelect controls the classes related to constructing an episode ID pool, random number pool, and applying the processing logic to select a random episode and return it for display in the JSP
    FetchEpisodeId
    Retrieves the API episode id from an ArrayList of Episode entities using the randomly generated number at index 0 of the passed Integer ArrayList
    LogIn
    Manages Amazon Web Service log out endpoint calls
    LogOut
    Manages Amazon Web Service log out endpoint calls
    Startup
    Startup loads a Properties file at servlet startup
    UpdateDatabaseManager
    UpdateDatabaseManager controls the functionality of the UpdateSeasonList and UpdateEpisodeList classes
    UserLoader
    UserLoader queries the database and loads User data for authenticated users into the HTTP session
